TITLE: Episode 15 - Web for the (Ideologically) Blind
DESCRIPTION: In this episode, Thaddeus and Gary discuss web accessibility standards, Mark Zuckerberg sort-of supporting free speech, the death of Libra, and the future of stablecoins.
